body: @pfrazee Do you have the crash dump?  Use `export ELECTRON_ENABLE_STACK_DUMPING=true` to get the full stack trace when Electron crashes.

@pfrazee are you able to reproduce this with 1.4.4?

I tried your sample app on 10.11.6 but it did not crash on 1.4.4
Nope, still crashing for me with 1.4.4. If you could reproduce it on your machine, how would you debug this? I might just need to dig into the codebase and start setting breakpoints.

> If you could reproduce it on your machine, how would you debug this? Does the standard mac crash dialog appear for you when this happens? Usually it contains a stack trace with symbols that helps to narrow down the issue.

Tried again, can definitely reproduce this on master using your example, thanks for providing it ðŸ‘ 

Not sure from the stack trace why this is happening though.
Hmm, is there any way to translate the stack trace's memory addresses to lines in the code? Maybe with a debug build?

> is there any way to translate the stack trace's memory addresses to lines in the code?

Here is the stack for the crashed thread from a debug build:
